channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - progress

item.title: Hardening is our business... new monthly report ;-)
item.description:
We're back with another report on the Gentoo Hardened project. Please excuse my brevity, as you've noticed I'm not that active (yet) due to work on an external project - I'll be back mid-July though. I promise.

On the Toolchain side, GCC 4.8.1 is in the tree and has â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
